title: Ultimate spaghetti bolognese
ingredients: ['500g minced beef', 'glug of olive oil', '1 white onion', '1 stick of celery (optional)', '1 carrot', '1 handful of sliced mushrooms', '2 cloves of garlic', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'squeeze of tomato puree', '1 glass red wine (optional but recommended!)', '400g chopped tomatoes', '400ml beef stock', 'splash of milk (trust me!)', 'splash of Worcestershire sauce', 'spaghetti (about 400g)', '1 handful of grated Parmesan cheese']
